## duplicateTask() function

Duplicate a task in OmniFocus. Creates a copy of the task with all its properties.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function duplicateTask(
  taskId: string,
  options?: DuplicateTaskOptions
): Promise<CliOutput<DuplicateTaskResult>>;
```
